name: City Escape (ramishawasim)
description:
Game:

Student: Ramisha Wasim

Class: DATT 3300 Tutorial 01

PLAY INSTRUCTIONS:

To play: Use WASD or arrow keys in order roam around the town and find 4 keys that are hidden all around the place. If you can not find all the keys in 5 minutes, you lose the game! If you manage to find the keys before the timer runs out then you have to find the gate and escape, if you manage to get through the congratulations, you win!
